guides.accountSecurityDesc: Tips for keeping your account safe and secure
feedback.subject: Subject
feedback.thankYou: Thank you for your feedback! We'll get back to you soon.
faq.howToBook: How do I book a service?
faq.howToBookAnswer: To book a service, browse our specialists, select the service you want, choose your preferred date and time, and complete the payment. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details.
faq.cancelReschedule: Can I cancel or reschedule my booking?
faq.cancelRescheduleAnswer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your booking up to 24 hours before the scheduled time. Go to "My Bookings" in your account to make changes. Cancellation policies may vary by specialist.
faq.howPaymentsWorkAnswer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. Payment is processed when you confirm your booking. For some services, you may pay a deposit upfront and the remainder after service completion.
faq.notSatisfied: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
faq.notSatisfiedAnswer: We want you to be completely satisfied. If you're not happy with your service, please contact us within 48 hours. We'll work with you and the specialist to resolve any issues.
faq.specialistsVerifiedAnswer: All our specialists go through a thorough verification process including background checks, credential verification, and skills assessment. We also monitor reviews and ratings continuously.
faq.leaveReviewAnswer: Yes! We encourage you to leave reviews after your service is completed. This helps other customers make informed decisions and helps specialists improve their services.
faq.personalInfoSecureAnswer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal information. We never share your data with third parties without your consent.
faq.updateProfile: How do I update my profile?
faq.updateProfileAnswer: Go to your account settings to update your profile information, payment methods, addresses, and preferences. Changes are saved automatically.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of {appName} ("we", "our", or "us"), a platform that connects customers with professional service specialists.
terms.section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.section1.body: By accessing or using {appName}, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.
terms.section2.title: 2. Description of Service
terms.section2.body: {appName} is a platform that allows customers to discover, book, and pay for professional services provided by independent specialists. We facilitate connections but are not responsible for the actual delivery of services.
terms.section3.title: 3. User Accounts
terms.section3.accountCreation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
terms.section3.accountCreation.item1: You must provide accurate and complete information
terms.section3.accountCreation.item2: You are responsible for maintaining account security
terms.section3.accountCreation.item3: One person or entity may not maintain multiple accounts
terms.section3.accountCreation.item4: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account
terms.section3.accountTypes.title: 3.2 Account Types
terms.section3.accountTypes.body: We offer two types of accounts:
terms.section4.title: 4. Customer Responsibilities
terms.section4.item1: Provide accurate booking information and special requirements
terms.section4.item2: Arrive on time for scheduled appointments
terms.section4.item3: Treat specialists with respect and professionalism
terms.section4.item4: Pay for services as agreed upon
terms.section4.item5: Cancel bookings according to cancellation policies
terms.section5.title: 5. Specialist Responsibilities
terms.section5.item1: Provide services as described and agreed upon
terms.section5.item3: Respond to booking requests in a timely manner
terms.section5.item5: Deliver services with reasonable skill and care
terms.section6.title: 6. Booking and Payment Terms
terms.section6.bookingProcess.title: 6.1 Booking Process
terms.section6.bookingProcess.body: Bookings are confirmed when payment is processed. All bookings are subject to specialist availability and acceptance.
terms.section6.payment.title: 6.2 Payment
terms.section6.payment.item1: Payments are processed securely through Stripe
terms.section6.payment.item2: Deposits may be required for certain services
terms.section6.payment.item3: Full payment is typically required before service delivery
terms.section6.payment.item4: Platform fees are included in displayed prices
terms.section6.cancellation.title: 6.3 Cancellation and Refunds
terms.section6.cancellation.item1: Cancellation policies vary by specialist and service type
terms.section6.cancellation.item2: Refunds are processed according to the applicable cancellation policy
terms.section6.cancellation.item3: Platform fees may not be refundable in certain circumstances
terms.section7.title: 7. Platform Fees
terms.section7.body: {appName} charges service fees to facilitate bookings:
terms.section7.item1: Customer service fee: Included in booking price
terms.section7.item3: Payment processing fees: As charged by Stripe
terms.section8.title: 8. Quality and Safety
terms.section8.verification.title: 8.1 Specialist Verification
terms.section8.verification.body: While we conduct basic verification checks, customers should independently verify specialist qualifications for their specific needs.
terms.section8.reviews.title: 8.2 Reviews and Ratings
terms.section8.reviews.item1: Reviews must be honest and based on actual experiences
terms.section8.reviews.item2: False or misleading reviews are prohibited
terms.section8.reviews.item3: We reserve the right to remove inappropriate reviews
terms.section9.title: 9. Prohibited Activities
terms.section9.item1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
terms.section9.item2: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
terms.section9.item3: Post false, misleading, or inappropriate content
terms.section9.item5: Use automated systems to access the platform
terms.section9.item6: Interfere with platform operation or security
terms.section10.title: 10. Intellectual Property
terms.section10.body: The {appName} platform, including its design, code, and content, is protected by intellectual property laws. Users retain rights to their own content but grant us license to use it for platform operations.
terms.section11.title: 11. Privacy and Data
terms.section11.body: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service.
terms.section12.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
terms.section12.mediation.title: 12.1 Platform Mediation
terms.section12.mediation.body: We offer mediation services for disputes between customers and specialists. Contact our support team for assistance.
terms.section12.liability.title: 12.2 Limitation of Liability
terms.section12.liability.body: {appName} acts as an intermediary and is not liable for disputes between customers and specialists or the quality of services provided.
terms.section13.title: 13. Termination
terms.section13.body: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms. Users may close their accounts at any time through account settings.
terms.section14.title: 14. Changes to Terms
terms.section14.body: We may modify these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be communicated via email or platform notifications. Continued use constitutes acceptance of updated Terms.
terms.section15.title: 15. Governing Law
terms.section15.body: These Terms are governed by the laws of [Jurisdiction]. Disputes will be resolved in the courts of [Jurisdiction].
terms.section16.title: 16. Contact Information
terms.section16.body: For questions about these Terms, contact us at:
terms.important.title: Important
terms.important.body: By using {appName}, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how {appName} ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our service booking platform.
privacy.section1.title: Information We Collect
privacy.section1.personal.title: Personal Information
privacy.section1.personal.body: When you create an account, we collect information such as:
privacy.section1.personal.item1: Full name and contact information (email, phone number)
privacy.section1.personal.item2: Profile information (avatar, bio, specialties for specialists)
privacy.section1.personal.item4: Location data (to match you with nearby specialists)
privacy.section1.usage.title: Usage Data
privacy.section1.usage.body: We automatically collect information about how you use our platform:
privacy.section2.title: How We Use Your Information
privacy.section2.item1: Provide and improve our booking services
privacy.section2.item6: Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
privacy.section3.title: Information Sharing
privacy.section3.body: We share your information only in specific circumstances:
privacy.section3.item1.label: With specialists:
privacy.section3.item1.text: We share necessary booking details when you make a reservation
privacy.section3.item2.label: With customers:
privacy.section3.item2.text: Specialists can see customer information relevant to bookings
privacy.section3.item3.label: Service providers:
privacy.section3.item3.text: Payment processing, hosting, and other essential services
privacy.section3.item4.label: Legal requirements:
privacy.section3.item4.text: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.section4.title: Data Security
privacy.section4.body: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:
privacy.section4.item1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
privacy.section5.title: Your Rights
privacy.section5.item1: Access and review your personal information
privacy.section5.item3: Delete your account and associated data
privacy.section5.item5: Request a copy of your data
privacy.section6.title: Cookies and Tracking
privacy.section6.body: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.
privacy.section7.title: Third-Party Services
privacy.section7.body: Our platform integrates with third-party services:
privacy.section7.item1.label: Stripe:
privacy.section7.item2.label: Google Maps:
privacy.section7.item3.label: Telegram:
privacy.section8.title: Data Retention
privacy.section8.body: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. We may retain certain information for legal compliance or legitimate business purposes.
privacy.section9.title: Children's Privacy
privacy.section9.body: Our services are not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.
privacy.section10.title: International Data Transfers
privacy.section10.body: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.
privacy.section11.title: Changes to This Policy
privacy.section11.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by email or through our platform.
privacy.section12.title: Contact Information
privacy.section12.body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
privacy.important.title: Important Note
privacy.important.body: By using {appName}, you consent to the collection and use of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.
